I have talked with Elder C twice since then in regard to his increasing family, that brought such burdens upon his wife. The brother who wrote from Adelaide stated that when they thought that Sister White was coming they felt sure the Lord would set things before her, and he would be sent back to 


                                    -454- 

America and, said he, "The Lord did work to relieve the church."--Letter 40, 1892, pp. 15, 16. (To O. A. Olsen, July 15, 1892.)
